title.quote: Stochastic Mirror Descent: Convergence Analysis and Adaptive Variants via the Mirror Stochastic Polyak Stepsize

extractions.description: The paper investigates the convergence of stochastic mirror descent (SMD) under interpolation in relatively smooth and smooth convex optimization. It introduces new convergence guarantees for SMD with a constant stepsize and proposes a new adaptive stepsize scheme—the mirror stochastic Polyak stepsize (mSPS). The results are supported by experiments demonstrating the effectiveness of mSPS.

type.justification: The paper provides new theoretical convergence guarantees and proposes a new adaptive stepsize scheme.
type.quote: We investigate the convergence of stochastic mirror descent (SMD) under interpolation in relatively smooth and smooth convex optimization. In relatively smooth convex optimization we provide new convergence guarantees for SMD with a constant stepsize. For smooth convex optimization we propose a new adaptive stepsize scheme — the mirror stochastic Polyak stepsize (mSPS).
